001package org.relationlearn.test;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import org.relationlearn.filters.CommonWordsFilter;
005import org.relationlearn.filters.PunctuationCounterFilter;
006import org.relationlearn.filters.TextFilter;
007import org.relationlearn.filters.WordOcurrenceFilter;
008import org.relationlearn.filters.WordRatioFilter;
009import org.relationlearn.filters.WordSearchFilter;
010import org.relationlearn.util.TextUtils;
011
012/**
013 *
014 * @author Dídac
015 */
016public class TestLearning {
017    
018    private static final String TEST_TEXT = "Random alcohol tests are more effective than alternative measures. \""
019            + "The federal Justice Department of Canada moved to implement Random Breath Testing (RBT), \""
020            + "concluding: \"a system of random checks is more effective "
021            + "than a combination of other measures such as a lower "
022            + "threshold for blood alcohol level and more frequent RIDE checkpoints\"";
023    
024    private static final String TEST_TEXT_2 = "Repeat drunk drivers unlikely to "
025            + "respond to random breath testing deterrence. \"One statistic the "
026            + "MAD bunch doesn't like to mention is the fact that half of the people "
027            + "killed by drunk drivers have at least double the legal blood alcohol "
028            + "limit. They don't like it because it implies that, on a sliding scale, "
029            + "drivers who are barely over the legal limit are probably not that bad. "
030            + "It suggests that problems associated with drunk driving are overwhelmingly "
031            + "caused by a small cadre of hard-core problem drinkers who are sloshed "
032            + "behind the wheel. Unfortunately, these are also the people who are the "
033            + "least responsive to legal incentives, so MAD - and the law - targets "
034            + "ordinary people who have a glass or two of sherry instead\".";
035    
036    public static void main(String args[]) {
037        System.out.println("ORIGINAL: " + TEST_TEXT);
038        System.out.println("PARSED: " + Arrays.toString(TextUtils.getWordsFromText(TEST_TEXT)));
039        TextFilter tf1 = new CommonWordsFilter();
040        TextFilter tf2 = new WordRatioFilter();
041        TextFilter tf3 = new PunctuationCounterFilter();
042        TextFilter tf4 = new WordSearchFilter("legal");
043        TextFilter tf5 = new WordOcurrenceFilter("word-ocurrence", Arrays.asList("people", "driver", "drunk"));
044        System.out.println("CommonWordFilter: " + tf1.filter(TEST_TEXT, TEST_TEXT_2));
045        System.out.println("WordRatioFilter: " + tf2.filter(TEST_TEXT, TEST_TEXT_2));
046        System.out.println("PunctuationCounterFilter: " + tf3.filter(TEST_TEXT, TEST_TEXT_2));
047        System.out.println("WordSearchFilter: " + tf4.filter(TEST_TEXT, TEST_TEXT_2));
048        System.out.println("WordOcurrenceFilter: " + tf5.filter(TEST_TEXT, TEST_TEXT_2));
049    }
050
051}
